title: Save up to 35% with the Sony WH-CH520 Headphones!
description: The WH-CH520 Headphones feature up to 50 hours of battery life, custom EQ profiles, and more. The post Save up to 35% with the Sony WH-CH520 Headphones! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: The WH-CH520 Headphones feature up to 50 hours of battery life, custom EQ profiles, and more.
text: While the highlight of Sony’s audio gear selection lies mostly with its high-end WH-1000XM4 and XM5 headphones, the Japanese electronics giant nevertheless specializes in producing wireless audio products for buyers with different budgets, and the Sony WH-CH520 Headphones are a pretty good example of this. Currently on sale at Amazon right now, they’re going for as low as $38.00, with a 35% discount. In terms of features, the WH-CH520 Headphones feature up to 50 hours of battery on a single charge, custom EQ profiles, DSEE support, multipoint connection and fast pair for easy device connectivity, as well as a lightweight design that’s ideal for long music sessions. You can check them out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
While the highlight of Sony’s audio gear selection lies mostly with its high-end WH-1000XM4 and XM5 headphones, the Japanese electronics giant nevertheless specializes in producing wireless audio products for buyers with different budgets, and the Sony WH-CH520 Headphones are a pretty good example of this. Currently on sale at Amazon right now, they’re going for as low as $38.00, with a 35% discount.

In terms of features, the WH-CH520 Headphones feature up to 50 hours of battery on a single charge, custom EQ profiles, DSEE support, multipoint connection and fast pair for easy device connectivity, as well as a lightweight design that’s ideal for long music sessions. You can check them out using the link below.
